sorcer.core.exertion

Class ExertionMethodFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.exertion.ExertionMethodFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodFactory

    public class ExertionMethodFactory
extends Object
implements MethodFactory
    This class creates instances of appropriate subclasses of ServiceMethod. The appropriate subclass is determined by calling the exertion signatures.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Signature createMethod(Signature method)
      This method returns an instnace of the appropriate subclass of RemmoteServiceMethod as determined from information provided by the given ServiceMethod instance.
